item.title: Did you win $308 million? Check Powerball tickets for Monday, July 21
item.description: Will a$2 Powerball ticket make you a multimillionaire? As they say in the lottery business, “it could happen to you.”

item.title: MS&C Commercial welcome new commercial property manager.
item.description: Michael Saunders & Company, a top real estate broker in Southwest Florida, has hired Amanda Sanders as its commercial property manager.

item.title: Florida ranks 21st for US school systems in this list…
item.description: Every parent wants to give their child the best education possible; however, the quality of public school systems varies widely from state to state, depending on the amount of funding.

item.title: Ingoglia sworn-in as CFO; Trump-fueled fight looms next…
item.description: Thelatest appointeeof Gov. Ron DeSantis, state Chief Financial Officer Blaise Ingoglia, wassworn into officeamid questions about his prospects of winning next year's election because his selection wasopposed by President Trump.

item.title: Trump shares fake-AI video of Obama being arrested to…
item.description: PresidentDonald Trumpreposted avideo on Truth Socialthat showed a fake, artificially rendered scene of formerPresident Barack Obamabeing arrested.

item.title: Ice cream bars recalled from Florida company for…
item.description: Check your freezer: Florida-basedRich's Ice Creamis recallingmore than 110,000 cases of ice cream barsdue to potential listeria monocytogenes contamination.

item.title: Winn-Dixie and Aldi: List of differences between the two…
item.description: If you don’t have an Aldi near you yet, you likely will soon.

item.title: Checking in with Venice's top recruits as football season approaches
item.description: Venice is coming off a banner season − literally − going 14-1 last year on the way to a Class 7A Championship with their lone blemish being a one-score loss to IMG Academy.

item.title: Roaches, insects found at Sarasota area restaurants: inspections
item.description: Ourdigital databaseof restaurant health inspections is updated regularly with the latest information on which Sarasota, Bradenton and Venice area restaurants passed or failed.
